extendedInfo.description: Do you want to feel fitter, healthier and less stressed during a busy week? It's easy with the Lucy Wyndham-Read Personal Trainer app for women. Tell the app your target weight and the areas of your body you want to tone, and it builds a 28-day personalised workout and healthy eating plan for you. From the publishers of Women's Fitness and Health & Fitness magazines, developed in association with renowned personal trainer Lucy Wyndham-Read, every day in the app features a short, fun workout and a full meal plan along with exercise tips.  It's easy to record your progress through the workout plan and a series of motivational videos help you keep on the right track. The app is full of exercises which are fun, straightforward and easy. They donât require special kit and will easily fit around your busy lifestyle - making them ideal for getting back into exercise and feeling good about yourself.* Over 80 different exercises to try, with photos for every step * Over 85 different  healthy eating recipes* Shopping list to track what food you need* 28 high quality motivational videos to help you keep up with the plan* Calorie and weight tracking features* No internet connection required

reviews.title: HTC EVO 3D
reviews.comment: Seems cool so far but I don\'t know what some of the foods are or where to buy them here in the US.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it.
reviews.comment: Deff crap. they choose all the foods for you. Theyre foods i dont eat. When i try to add my own all i can put is a name and cals but no fiber protein nothing...doesnt that matter in a diet as well. The work outs i will admit r ok but nothing else is relevent. This app need major work!! 2.30 is cheap and i guess u get what u pay for him!! Dont waste ur money, i kno i wish i hadnt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: I like that the workouts are quick and that each one is automatically timed for 1 minute -- but I would like it better if it would \"say\" what the workout is when it starts so that I don\'t have to stop and look at my phone. I don\'t use the menu options because I have my own foods that I enjoy, so I just track the calories and record it in my phone.  I like that there is a \"motivation\" button that helps talk you into working out.  I have a Google Nexus S and it works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but...
reviews.comment: It\'s a shame it doesn\'t reset after the 28 days are up.  You can\'t go back and adjust your target areas or weight.  I found the menu a bit repetative so didn\'t really use it.  On the plus side the workouts are quick and effective which is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aida
reviews.comment: I bought the program but it keeps saying that it is not licenced.  I dont know what to do!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Try
reviews.comment: I like the app when it worked. Now, it just force closes. Haven\'t used it in about two monthd and still having the same issues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I don\'t really care for this app. The exercises are good but without audio it makes it difficult since you have to keep looking at your phone which kind of makes it counter productive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: OK app, nice looking. Wish it had more personal options though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t install on my Samsung Galaxy S...
reviews.comment: I purchased this app but I am unable to get it to install on my Samsung Galaxy S because I keep getting an error message saying that there is insufficient memory available on my phone, despite more than enough free memory.  Other apps install just fine, so I\'m not too sure what the problem is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I have two kids and this app stil fits into my busy day. it is awesome and makes working out and eating right so easy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: almost but not quite
reviews.comment: Nice looking app. good content but on the progress chart it doesn\'t deduct the calories used through exercise from those consumed, so you don\'t really know how well you are doing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LWR Personal Trainer
reviews.comment: WOW, everything you could need. Your exercises are provided, meals are there. What a brilliant APP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closing
reviews.comment: App looks lovely,but I can\'t get passed the first attempt to create a plan. It keeps force closing. Sadly I can\'t get refund as wasn\'t able to test it quick enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t even install
reviews.comment: Purchased app and can\'t even install. Have several hundreds of MB free for apps, but says there is not enough space on phone :( Other bigger apps install with no problem
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: One of the best app for get fit using Android!!!! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Licence problem
reviews.comment: I love this app howerver after about two weeks I get a message saying the license has expired and I need to repurchase the app. which requires me to delete the app then download it again restarting my eating plan. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User
